text: The 2018 season will see Yishun Sentek Mariners complete in the National Football League. The 2018 season will be sponsored by Ajinomoto (S) Pte Ltd, making it the 1st season which is to be sponsored by a Japanese Company. They are the defending champion for this season after winning the 2017 title. ==Squad== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:85%; width:80%;" |- ! style="background:#0000CD; color:yellow; text-align:center;"| No. ! colspan="5" style="background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center;"| Forwards |- | 7 | Shamsurin Rahman | | | Singapore Recreation Club |- | 12 | Zulkiffli Hassim | | | Balestier Khalsa |- | 24 | Zulkifli Suzliman | | | Young Lions FC |- |} ==Transfers== ===Pre-Season=== ====Retained==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:50%; text-align:center; font-size:100%; text-align:left;" !Position !Player !Ref |- | | | |- | | | |- | | | |- | | | |- |} ====In==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:75%; text-align:center; font-size:95%; text-align:left;" |- !Position !Player !Transferred From !Ref |- | | | Warriors FC | |- | | | Warriors FC | |- | | | Tampines Rovers | |- |} ====Out==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:75%; text-align:center; font-size:95%; text-align:left;" |- !Position !Player !Transferred To !Ref |- | | | Warwick Knights FC | |- | | | GFA Sporting Westlake FC | |- | | | Project Vaults Oxley Sports Club | |- | | | Jungfrau Punggol FC | |- | | | Warwick Knights FC | |- |} == Suspension from 2017 saga == Due to the fighting case between the team and SAFSA in the 2017 NFL match, the following players were given ban. 1) Haziq Sudhir & Zulfadhli Suzliman - 4 months suspension 2) Azlan Razak, Fawwaz Anuar & Muhaimin Mansor - 6 months suspension 3) Zul Feshal - 12 months suspension 4) Hidayat Rohaizad and Sharil Jupri - 15 months suspension ==References== Yishun Sentek Mariners FC
